entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
